title: Smoky Mountain National Park
description: In October 2018 my wife and I went to the Smoky Mountains.

photos.description: Some tree roots. I like the kind of shiny/slimy-looking texture.
A spider that my camera struggled to find enough light to capture.
photos.alt: A small spider in a web against a black background.

photos.description: A bunch of fog, hence the "smoky" part.
photos.alt: A mountain rising out of dense fog.

photos.description: Many trees on some mountains and more fog.
photos.alt: A densely forested mountain with patches of fog.

photos.description: Water droplets dripping from above part-way up Mount LeConte. Lens flare too for extra style.
photos.alt: Water droplets falling from a cliff above.

photos.description: A view from the top of Mount LeConte. I'm not sure what those flowers (?) are in the foreground, but I like the texture they add.
photos.alt: A high view of a forested mountain with colorful flowers in the foreground.
